## Background
I've been a member of the [#rstats](https://twitter.com/hashtag/rstats) since 2012 and have enjoyed every minute of it. I received my Masters degree from Georgetown University where I was advised by Dr. Todd Lean and Dr. Hans Engler.
Prior to Georgetown, I received my Undergraduate Degree from the University of California, Berkeley and worked at SpoonRocket (defunct) and [Greatschools](https://www.greatschools.org/).
